course_title: SEM: Law, Rights & Privacy in the Surveillance Society
class_notes: Available to pre-selected students during registration. Remaining seats will be available during open enrollment.
course_description: The seminar will examine the fundamental and unpredictable twenty-first century upheaval in human society-including politics, economics, communications, education, social media, commerce, human relationships, and of course, law and the nature of rights-through which we are living.
